comments.body: Quote from: ahmim on February 06, 2023, 02:40:31 PMBumpWhy don't you answer the accusations that you cheated on bounty campaigns?https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5394559.msg61710493#msg61710493If you want anyone to trust you and entrust you with campaign management, you should start by clearing up this situation.
